name: ASTROPOVER
description:
Story

Your one your way in the space, and than you run out of power for your car.
You take a stop over in this alien world and search for batteries.

You have to survive until the last level,
pick up as many batteries as possible
and go back in you car to continue you journey.

!!!! Attention !!!!

Astropover is not an easy game to run through.
It’s important to remember where your opponents appear.
In the LudumDare version there is the possibility to start a level again or you can even jump to the next level.

This game was created for the LudumDare 41 game jam.
The topic was Combine 2 Incompatible Genres. 
We tried to create a mixture of Jump & Run and Bullet Hell/shmup.
We hope you like it as much as we do.

Controls keybord
  • jump [space / up arrow / W]
  • shoot [ctrl / left mouse]
  • left [left arrow / A]
  • right [right arrow / D]
  • shoot dir [mouse]
Gamepad
  • not yet supported
Assets

We have created all the game content during the game jam.

Tools
  • godot engine
  • pyxel edit
  • Affinity Designer
  • vlc / audacity
  • Ableton
